price: 27. Y solo el solemne y honorable rostro[997] de tu Señor permanecerá para siempre.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
footnotes: [997]  Ver la nota de la aleya 115 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
